name: An Incredibly Long Night
description:
I’ve been listening to Phish for most of my adult life and it just may be my favorite religion. To me, Phish is not just great music to listen to but it’s also an experience that causes me to connect with something beyond myself that is a feeling of life as it is meant to be. 

This is a digital painting made in procreate and inspired by the line “And the night seems to go on incredibly long” from the song, Theme From the Bottom by Phish. On one hand it’s a literal interpretation of a long night but it also suggests our ability to experience an expanded consciousness of our place in the universe.
